editorialSummary.text: Modern rooms & suites in a polished, high-end hotel with 2 restaurants, a spa & an outdoor pool.

text.text:
From the moment we arrived, the hospitality at Hyatt was truly outstanding. The staff went above and beyond to ensure every need was met with warmth and professionalism. The food was a highlight — an expansive and diverse buffet featuring top-quality dishes that catered to every palate. Each meal felt like a culinary experience!

The rooms were clean, comfortable, and well-appointed, offering a relaxing retreat after a day of indulgence. Every detail, from service to ambiance, was thoughtfully curated.

Absolutely loved every moment of our stay — this is hospitality at its finest. Highly recommended!

text.text:
I’ve stayed at Hyatt Pune a couple of times now, including this year and last. It’s located close to Aga Khan Palace, not too far from the airport or Phoenix Mall, which makes it convenient for work or quick errands. This is an older property compared to the newer Hyatt Pune Residences nearby, and that shows in the interiors. The rooms are spacious, but the dark wood décor makes them feel smaller and almost crampped. Still, they’re well equipped with a study table, high back chairs and footstool, wardrobe, and a clean bathroom unit with shower and sink.

The pool area is nicely done and located next to their spa and salon. The salon is run by Arya, and I’ve used it during work trips it’s great to have those services available when you’re short on time and need something basic for hair or skincare. They also have a Blue Tokai coffee counter in the lobby, which is a plus if you like good coffee and are coming from cities like Bangalore.

The food, however, is something I feel doesn’t quite match up to five-star standards, not just at Hyatt but across many luxury hotels in Pune. That said, the Asian restaurant has a pleasant vibe—especially at night when the water wall is lit up—and the food is decent. One small touch I appreciated was at breakfast, where they placed a tiny glass bowl with a single fish on tables where people were dining alone. It was thoughtful and not something you see often.

Staff is courteous and helpful. Check-in was smooth, and they were proactive in helping with things like flower arrangements when we needed them. Overall, it’s a good property, especially for work trips, with a few thoughtful touches that stand out.

The location of this property is excellent, with easy access to key parts of the city. What really stood out during my stay was the exceptional staff – warm, attentive, and always willing to help, which made the experience smooth and pleasant.
The food quality was good, especially the breakfast spread, which had a wide variety of fresh, flavorful options.
The rooms, however, are on the smaller side . While they are well-designed and clean, those who prefer more spacious accommodations might find them a bit compact.

Overall, Hyatt Pune delivers a high-quality stay with great hospitality and is definitely worth considering.

editorialSummary.text: High-end hotel with luxe quarters & 3 stylish restaurants, plus an outdoor pool, a gym & a spa

text.text:
The property itself is beautiful and the service throughout my stay was very good. As a Diamond member I was upgraded to an executive room, which was appreciated, although I had hoped for a suite to truly experience the full Conrad touch. Unlike my experience at the Conrad Bengaluru, there was no welcome note waiting in the room, no small treats or snacks, and the upgrade felt more standard than special.

Breakfast was lively and at times quite busy, but the quality of the food was very good and worth the wait. The rooms were spacious and comfortable, with thoughtful amenities. I especially liked how the power outlets were conveniently placed and adaptable to international standards, which made things much easier as a traveler. The water pressure in the shower was excellent, which is always a welcome detail after a long day.

The hotel is also very conveniently located, making it a great choice for both business and leisure. Overall it was a pleasant stay, but I left wishing there had been a few more of those signature touches that usually set Conrad apart.

text.text: I stayed at ‘O Hotel’ in Pune recently and had a generally good experience. The rooms were clean, comfortable, and well-maintained, and the food was impressive with a variety of tasty options. The service was also commendable, with staff being polite and attentive. However, I was taken aback by their strict rule prohibiting outside food and alcohol in the rooms, which felt restrictive and inconvenient. While this rule did put me off, the overall experience was positive, and I’d still recommend the hotel for its quality amenities and service, though I hope they reconsider this policy.

editorialSummary.text: Contemporary rooms in an upscale hotel featuring 5 restaurants, a spa & an outdoor pool.

text.text:
This was my third stay at JW Marriott Pune, and the consistently excellent service keeps bringing me back. Check-in was smooth and effortless as always. I appreciated the staff’s warm professionalism and their gracious refusal to accept tips, true hospitality. In-room dining was prompt and beautifully presented. The breakfast buffet is outstanding, with a well-balanced mix of local Maharashtrian favorites and international options.
Staff was ready to go above and beyond to help me recover in my delhi belly episode that I got from outside. Highly recommended for both business and leisure stays.

originalText.text:
This was my third stay at JW Marriott Pune, and the consistently excellent service keeps bringing me back. Check-in was smooth and effortless as always. I appreciated the staff’s warm professionalism and their gracious refusal to accept tips, true hospitality. In-room dining was prompt and beautifully presented. text.text:
A memorable stay with warm hospitality, but marred by a persistent issue

The hotel itself is lovely — great ambiance, warm hospitality, and excellent restaurants. I truly appreciated the thoughtful upgrade to a suite, which was a wonderful gesture. The personalized welcome in the room — a platter of rose petals, soothing bath salts, and a handwritten note — reflected the attention to detail and care from the housekeeping team.

However, my experience was significantly impacted by the lack of hot water in both the shower and the wash basin. When I say no hot water, I mean completely cold — not even lukewarm. Despite raising the issue twice and following up with a third reminder over a 24-hour period, the problem remained unresolved. I was repeatedly assured it would be fixed, but unfortunately, it wasn't.

To the hotel’s credit, the senior staff at checkout were apologetic and took the time to engage with me about the issue. That said, prevention is better than cure — and when something does go wrong, a prompt resolution is critical. Operational follow-through on customer complaints needs improvement to match the otherwise excellent service standards.

While I was disappointed by this lapse, the overall experience and the staff’s warmth mean I am still likely to return — albeit with the hope that service recovery becomes as strong as the welcome.

I recently attended a business conference focused on SMEs, and it was notable to see that most of the business owners themselves preferred to attend. Although the event was primarily meant for C-level executives, their active participation seemed natural—likely due to the convenience of travel, excellent facilities, high service standards, and the overall brand reputation of JW Marriott.

The venue offered a spacious banquet hall with a comfortable cluster-style seating arrangement. There was ample space allocated for both the bar counter and the food counters, ensuring a seamless experience.

The food was another highlight—authentic, delicious, and
thoughtfully curated. Both vegetarian and non-vegetarian options were available, served alongside a well-rounded dessert selection.

text.text:
Here’s a harsher, more detailed version of your review:

---

Absolutely the Worst Resort Experience Ever – A Complete Nightmare!

I don’t usually leave reviews, but this place was so unbelievably horrible that I feel obligated to warn others. Where do I even start?

The staff were beyond pathetic — rude, unprofessional, and shockingly drunk on duty. It felt unsafe being there, especially with such careless and intoxicated people running the place.

The room? Disgusting. Filthy floors, stained sheets, and a stench that made it impossible to relax. The washroom looked like it hadn’t been cleaned in weeks — mold, hair, and dirt everywhere. Truly unhygienic and a health hazard.

This wasn’t just a bad experience; it was a disaster. It felt like we were trapped in some horror movie version of a resort. Avoid this place at all costs unless you want to risk your safety, your sanity, and your health. Should be shut down permanently.

---

Want to add any specific incidents or photos to really hammer the point home?

---

Absolutely the Worst Resort Experience Ever – A Complete Nightmare!

I don’t usually leave reviews, but this place was so unbelievably horrible that I feel obligated to warn others. Where do I even start?

The staff were beyond pathetic — rude, unprofessional, and shockingly drunk on duty. It felt unsafe being there, especially with such careless and intoxicated people running the place.

The room? Disgusting. Filthy floors, stained sheets, and a stench that made it impossible to relax. The washroom looked like it hadn’t been cleaned in weeks — mold, hair, and dirt everywhere. Truly unhygienic and a health hazard.

This wasn’t just a bad experience; it was a disaster. It felt like we were trapped in some horror movie version of a resort. Avoid this place at all costs unless you want to risk your safety, your sanity, and your health. Should be shut down permanently.

---

Want to add any specific incidents or photos to really hammer the point home?

text.text:
Absolutely Wonderful Stay – Felt Like Home!

We recently had the pleasure of staying at Royal Orchid Central Pune and I must say, it was an incredible experience from start to finish!

Right from the moment we checked in, the hospitality was top-notch. A big shoutout to Subhojeet and Pranali from the front office who went above and beyond to assist us. Despite a bit of a mix-up with the reservations team, they handled everything smoothly — arranging a smoking room for us and even extending our checkout time without any extra cost. It was such a relief and really made our stay more comfortable.

A special mention to the Front Office Manager (FOM) who ensured we got the best possible tariff, allowing us to enjoy a luxurious suite room which they usually don’t sale on OTAs. Their flexibility and understanding truly stood out.

The housekeeping team, especially Chetan and Tushar, were amazing as well. The room decoration was done beautifully and right on time, and they maintained cleanliness throughout our stay with a friendly and professional attitude.

Lastly, a big thank you to Tejas from the F&B team, who ensured our in-room dining experience was seamless and prompt. Every order was served with care and attention to detail.

Overall,bit ups and down but this stay was one of the best we’ve had in Pune after a long time where they have bathtubs in all the guest rooms, and it’s all thanks to the wonderful team at Royal Orchid Central. We felt genuinely cared for, and we can’t wait to return!

Highly recommended!

text.text:
I recently stayed at Royal Orchid Central, Pune, and overall, it was a wonderful experience. The rooms were clean, comfortable, and well-maintained, and the service across the board was prompt and courteous. Housekeeping was efficient, and the amenities offered were up to the mark for a comfortable business or leisure stay.

However, I did face one hiccup at the front desk, which left me a bit disappointed. I had inquired about any ongoing offers or discounts at their in-house restaurant for hotel guests—something that’s fairly common at most hotels. Initially, I was told there was an offer, but when it came time for billing, they denied any such discount without clear explanation. It felt like the front desk staff either weren’t informed or weren’t aligned with the restaurant’s communication, which was frustrating.

That aside, everything else was smooth. I would recommend the property for its location, cleanliness, and service—but do double-check restaurant details in writing if you’re relying on in-house dining offers.

⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️ | Exceptional Hospitality at The Orchid Hotel

The Orchid Hotel truly exceeded all expectations — a perfect blend of luxury, comfort, and outstanding service. From the moment we arrived, the staff made us feel welcome with their warm hospitality and professional demeanor.

The rooms were impeccably clean, spacious, and well-appointed with everything needed for a comfortable stay. Every detail, from the bedding to the amenities, reflected the hotel’s high standards.

What stood out most was the exceptional service — the staff went above and beyond to ensure every request was handled promptly and with a smile. Whether it was front desk assistance, room service, or dining staff, their attention to detail and genuine care made our stay truly memorable.

The food was also a delight — fresh, flavorful, and served in a beautiful setting. Whether dining at the restaurant or enjoying breakfast, everything was top-notch.

Highly recommended for anyone looking for a relaxing and luxurious stay. The Orchid Hotel delivers the best in class, and I will definitely be returning!

Overall, a nice stay with great hospitality.

I wouldn’t miss the chance to thank the hotel manager for helping me out of an unpleasant situation. When I first entered my room, there was a strong, unpleasant odor. I reported it to the reception, and while they tried to fix it with a room spray, it didn’t help much. Later, I figured out the smell was coming from the carpet. Upon raising the issue again, they quickly shifted me to another room with tiled flooring. That room was much better, and I could enjoy the rest of my stay comfortably.

Also, I must mention, the food was absolutely awesome, especially the vegetarian options. No doubt, the food was a highlight of the stay!

text.text:
I stayed at multiple Bloom properties - and loved their minimalist, yet fresh feel they bring to the otherwise boring business stays. But this Koregaon Park property hasn’t bloomed yet. Clearly.

No signature Citrus fragrance anywhere in the property. Lighting is dim. Entry to the room is through a dingy set of stairs. Like walking through a store room.

Housekeeping standards are poor, by Bloom standards. Who wants to see the dinner plates in the hallway at 8AM?

Room Service folks don’t pick calls for a long time, and they don’t call back. Restaurant / Cafe in bloom is always buzzing. This one put me to sleep. Music didn’t exist. More like a glorified hostel. Food lacks soul.

Location is good. The property is still better than many other hotel options, but this isn’t a ‘Bloom’ experience for me. I will be avoiding Bloom Koregaon park - at least for the next few Pune visits.

text.text:
I stayed at Crowne Plaza Pune for a business trip and found it to be a reasonable choice in terms of value for money. The pricing is fair, the location is convenient, and the rooms are quite spacious—ideal for business travelers.

However, the hotel does show signs of wear, and cleanliness was a concern—there was noticeable dust in the room, along with some leftover hair from previous guests.

Breakfast was average, offering both Indian and continental options, but the ingredients didn’t seem particularly fresh. Additionally, the gym is quite basic and could benefit from an upgrade.

On a positive note, the overall staff was polite and attentive, providing a friendly and accommodating service.

While the hotel offers a good location and reasonable pricing, improvements in cleanliness and amenities would enhance the experience.

text.text:
I appreciated the staff and their responsiveness in addressing our concerns quickly, and the lobby/reception area was welcoming (generally, top marks for the staff). Unfortunately, the overall state of the building was disappointing. We stayed on the 8th, 7th, and 4th floors, and each floor had a strong sewage odor (one room also smelled of cigarette smoke). Attempts to mask the smell with oils and fragrances only made it worse—walking through the hallways often left us feeling nauseous.

Given that the Crowne Plaza is positioned as a 5-star property competing with the Conrad and Sheraton nearby, the infrastructure does not meet that standard. The guest room flooring, bathroom shelving, elevators, and hallways are in clear need of refurbishment. At minimum, the plumbing system needs urgent attention.

The staff can only do so much; the real issue lies with the upkeep of the property. Until meaningful upgrades are made, we would not choose to stay here again

I booked this hotel at a very discounted price @ ₹3.6k.(including breakfast) Thats why i am giving 4 star. It does not worth more than 4k. (As of now)
I hope in future they improve maintenance and also breakfast.

text.text:
stayed at St. Lauren recently, and unfortunately, my experience was far from pleasant. Let me break it down point by point so future guests know what to expect:

1. Cockroaches in the room – Imagine checking in and finding these unwelcome “roommates.” Not the kind of hospitality I was expecting.

2. Swimming pool hygiene – The pool was dirty, and even after complaining, it took the hotel staff an entire day to clean it. Definitely not guest-friendly.

3. Used shaving kit – Shockingly, the kit provided had hair stuck to it. Reusing toiletries for guests is unacceptable and unhygienic.

4. Deceptive photos – Don’t go by the glossy pictures online. The property is old, worn-out, and needs serious maintenance.

5. Food quality – The food was okay, but not excellent. For the price and branding, I expected much better.

6. Non-smoking confusion – I booked a non-smoking room, but later realized the entire hotel is non-smoking. To top it off, they have warnings everywhere about a ₹5,000 penalty if you smoke. Felt more like a restriction than hospitality.

7. Room service – To be fair, this was the only saving grace. The staff attending the room were polite and prompt.

Overall, my stay was a letdown, and I wouldn’t recommend this hotel to anyone looking for comfort and value for money.

text.text:
The Hotel is okay. I stayed from 2/7 to 4/7 in Room 402. As soon as I entered the Hotel the giant blowers above the reception tried to push me out of the Hotel. I did not understand the purpose of these blowers but the blow was certainly not pleasant.
Both days I had to call for bath & hand towel which was surprising. The bath towel was torn. The carpet in the corridor was not clean.
Restaurant serves good Food.
In Buffet Breakfast I found that the arrangement of Juice Jars was incorrect. The jars are placed (in water) behind sandwiches, dhokla and cut fruits. When any of the jar is picked up the water at the outer bottom of the jar drips on the food ( sandwiches, dhokla and cut fruits).  I brought it to the notice of the duty manager. I hope the arrangement has been changed.
All in all not a very pleasant stay.

We just completed our fourth stay at this hotel and absolutely loved it once again. The atmosphere is cozy, and the service is warm and attentive.

One point to note is that the hotel isn’t fully wheelchair accessible — some areas, like the lounge and restaurants, can only be reached by stairs. However, the staff went above and beyond to help us with my mother, who uses a wheelchair. They were always quick to assist and ensured she was safely brought wherever we needed to go.

The food and service continue to impress, and I would definitely return in the future.

text.text:
The Sheraton Grand Pune is a luxurious hotel located in the vibrant city of Pune, India. This upscale establishment offers a blend of modern amenities and elegant design, making it an ideal choice for both business travelers and vacationers. The hotel features spacious and well-appointed rooms, furnished with contemporary decor and equipped with essential amenities. Guests can enjoy stunning views of the cityscape or the lush greenery surrounding the hotel.

One of the highlights of the Sheraton Grand Pune is its exceptional dining options. The hotel boasts multiple restaurants and bars, serving a variety of cuisines, from traditional Indian dishes to international fare. The buffet breakfast is especially noteworthy, offering a wide range of fresh and delicious items to cater to diverse tastes.

The hotel also provides excellent facilities for business events, including well-equipped meeting rooms and banquet halls, making it a popular choice for corporate gatherings. Additionally, the Sheraton Grand features a luxurious spa, a fitness center, and a beautiful outdoor swimming pool, ensuring guests can unwind and rejuvenate during their stay.

The location of the hotel is another advantage, situated near key attractions, shopping areas, and corporate offices. The attentive and friendly staff further enhances the experience, providing top-notch service and hospitality.

Overall, the Sheraton Grand Pune stands out for its luxurious accommodations, fine dining, and extensive facilities. Whether you're in Pune for business or leisure, this hotel offers a memorable stay with a commitment to excellence, making it a highly recommended choice for travelers.

text.text:
Our four-day stay at The Westin was our first experience with this esteemed brand, and we arrived with the high expectations that naturally accompany a luxury five-star hotel. Celebrating our anniversary, we were simply looking for a relaxing staycation to unwind and enjoy each other's company.

For the most part, our experience was indeed lovely. The hotel undeniably possesses the hallmarks of a five-star establishment. The food and drinks were a definite highlight, and we particularly enjoyed the extensive breakfast buffet. However, if you're planning a longer stay like ours, be aware that the buffet options might become a tad repetitive. The hotel also boasts excellent amenities, including a spa that we thoroughly enjoyed. Our balcony room was comfortable, featuring an exceptionally comfortable bed and prompt service whenever we requested it. The staff across the hotel were consistently polite and courteous.

However, our stay was unfortunately punctuated by a series of unexpected hiccups that left us somewhat surprised, especially given the hotel's reputation. On one occasion, I was quite taken aback to find a piece of glass in my food during the breakfast buffet. While the staff were quick to apologize and address the situation, it was certainly a concerning incident.

My wife's experience with the salon was also disappointing. Despite enquiring a day in advance about curly hair products for a hair spa, the salon was unable to accommodate her needs. Furthermore, one day our room was missed during the cleaning service, even after we had specifically requested it. On our final night, we requested room service to clean our room upon our return, only to find that while the bed was tidied, the rubbish, trays, and the balcony remained untouched.

Speaking of the balcony, while it was a nice addition to our room, it ultimately felt underwhelming. Furnished with just a simple table and chairs and offering no shade from the intense daytime sun, it was unusable during the day. In the evenings, the abundance of mosquitos made it equally uninviting. The view from our room was also just satisfactory, with nearby buildings obstructing the sunrise.

Despite these issues, I must acknowledge the hotel's commendable service recovery efforts. The staff consistently apologized for each incident and genuinely tried their best to rectify the situations. This proactive approach to service was definitely appreciated.

Ultimately, our anniversary staycation at The Westin Koregaon Park was a blend of positive and negative experiences. While the hotel offers many of the luxuries and services one expects from a five-star establishment, the series of unfortunate incidents we encountered during our short stay was surprising. It leaves us questioning whether it was simply bad luck or if there are underlying inconsistencies. While we appreciated the good aspects like the food, the comfortable room, and the polite staff, and especially their attempts to make things right, the repeated issues did detract from the seamless and relaxing experience we had hoped for. The salon, in particular, could benefit from better-trained staff who are knowledgeable about all the services offered.

text.text:
Stayed at Novotel and it truly lives up to its brand reputation. The room was clean, well-lit, and had a warm, welcoming vibe. The bed was super cozy, and the TV came loaded with all the popular subscriptions — perfect for unwinding. There's a mini fridge, a nice bathroom with a great shower, and the view from the room was just beautiful. Although the room size is quite small but it's good. There are other packages which provide different rooms.

Breakfast was complimentary and surprisingly good — plenty of options to choose from. The pool is a nice addition, but keep in mind it’s open only until 7 PM. They also offer helpful amenities like laundry service, a weighing machine, and more.

Location-wise, it’s spot on. Ramwadi Metro Station is right in front, and getting a cab is never a problem. Plus, you're close to food streets and malls, which is super convenient. Overall, a comfortable and pleasant stay!

editorialSummary.text: Modern rooms in a upmarket hotel offering free Wi-Fi & breakfast, plus 3 restaurants & a pool.

text.text:
Team Lunch Review – Four Points by Sheraton

We recently had a team lunch at Four Points by Sheraton and overall, it was a great experience. The ambiance was elegant and comfortable, providing a perfect setting for a relaxed team gathering.

We opted for the buffet lunch, which had a good spread of dishes. The food was delicious and well-presented, and everyone appreciated the variety available in the main course and desserts.

However, there are a couple of areas for improvement. The vegetarian starter options were limited, and we would have appreciated a bit more variety for our vegetarian team members. Also, the refilling time for a few dishes was slightly slow, which caused a bit of a wait during peak lunch hour.

That said, the staff was courteous and responsive, and we enjoyed the overall experience. With a few small tweaks, it could be even better. Would still recommend for team lunches and group outings.

text.text:
Attended a wedding reception at Four Points by Sheraton in Pune, and while the venue impressed with its elegant décor and spacious banquet hall, the overall experience was mixed.

1. Ambience & Decor: The venue was beautifully arranged for the wedding, with tasteful lighting and seating that gave a premium feel. It’s an excellent space for large gatherings and special occasions.

2. Service: The staff were courteous and well-coordinated, ensuring guests were attended to promptly. The hospitality was professional throughout the event.

3. Food Quality: This was the most underwhelming part of the evening. The food didn’t quite live up to expectations, especially for a venue of this standard. Flavors were average and lacked the richness you typically expect at a high-end wedding buffet.

4. Location & Accessibility: Conveniently located in Viman Nagar, it’s easily accessible from the airport and other parts of the city, with ample parking space.

Overall, it’s a stylish venue ideal for upscale events, but there’s definitely room for improvement in the food department.

4. Location & Accessibility: Conveniently located in Viman Nagar, it’s easily accessible from the airport and other parts of the city, with ample parking space.

Overall, it’s a stylish venue ideal for upscale events, but there’s definitely room for improvement in the food department.

text.text:
Good 👍Hyatt Hotels Corporation, also known as Hyatt Hotels & Resorts, is a multinational hospitality company that manages and franchises hotels, resorts, and vacation properties. The company's headquarters are located in Chicago's Riverside Plaza area.
The Hyatt brand's roots date back to 1957, when entrepreneur Jay Pritzker purchased the original Hyatt House motel. Pritzker and his brother, Donald, grew the brand based on their belief in the importance of family and care.
On December 31, 2004, the Pritzker family business interests consolidated their hospitality assets under a single entity, Hyatt Hotels Corporation.
Hyatt's purpose is to deliver distinctive experiences for guests. The company's core purpose is to care for people so they can be their best.
Hyatt's Park Hyatt hotels and resorts offer luxury experiences in top-tier cultural destinations. Guests can expect highly personalized service, renowned art and design, and exceptional food and wine.

The Grant Hayat Hotel in Pune's Kalyani Nagar is an epitome of refined luxury, blending modern aesthetics with a warm, inviting atmosphere. From the moment you step into the opulent lobby, you're enveloped in an ambiance that exudes sophistication and comfort. 🌟

The culinary experience here is nothing short of a gastronomic delight. The hotel's restaurant serves an eclectic menu, with each dish crafted to perfection. Whether you’re indulging in their sumptuous continental breakfast or savoring the flavors of their signature Indian dishes, the quality and presentation are consistently top-notch. 🍽️

The ambiance is equally impressive. The décor is contemporary yet cozy, with soft lighting and tasteful furnishings that create an inviting environment for both business and leisure travelers. The open-air seating area is a particular highlight, offering a serene escape amidst the hustle and bustle of the city. 🌿

Service is impeccable, with staff who are attentive, courteous, and always willing to go the extra mile to ensure a memorable stay. The attention to detail is evident in every aspect, from the immaculate rooms to the thoughtful little touches like complimentary treats and personalized services.

In summary, the Grant Hayat Hotel is a standout in Pune’s hospitality scene. It offers a perfect blend of great food, stellar service, and an ambiance that makes you feel both pampered and at home. Highly recommended for anyone seeking a luxurious and satisfying stay in Pune. 🏨✨

Exceptional Service at Lemon Tree Premier, Pune

I recently stayed at the Lemon Tree Premier in Pune, and I must say, the experience was outstanding from start to finish. The hotel’s facilities were impeccable, and the atmosphere was both welcoming and professional.

However, what truly made my stay memorable was the exceptional service provided by the staff. I would like to take a moment to recognize a few individuals who went above and beyond to ensure my experience was perfect:
•	Joseph from the Guest Relations Department: His warm demeanor, attentiveness, and ability to address every concern with efficiency truly enhanced my stay. He is an asset to the hotel.
•	Preeti and Priya from the breakfast restaurant: Their professionalism, friendly service, and attention to detail during breakfast hours were impressive. They made mornings a delight with their positive attitude and excellent hospitality.

The dedication and hard work of these employees are a testament to the high standards upheld by the Lemon Tree Premier. I hope the management recognizes their outstanding contributions and rewards them accordingly.

I highly recommend this hotel to anyone visiting Pune and look forward to staying here again on my next trip.

It's a great hotel with spacious rooms. Rooms have a big window, good washroom, closet with enough space, plentiful pillows, a couch with a round table, a separate work table and a TV.
The restaurant has great food options. Tasty as well as healthy options are available. Food variety is plenty.
The gym is also good. Although maximum dumbbell weight available is 15kg. No barbell. Too many cardio machines. One chest press cum shoulder press machine is present.
For swimming enthusiasts, the pool is of enough size.
Overall, this is a good option. Mainly for business visitors.

I recently had the pleasure of staying at Conrad Pune and it was nothing short of exceptional. From the moment I stepped into the elegant lobby, I was greeted with warm hospitality and a sense of luxury that permeated throughout my entire stay.

The rooms were exquisitely appointed, offering a perfect blend of comfort and sophistication. The attention to detail in the design and amenities provided a true sense of indulgence. The bed was incredibly comfortable, ensuring a restful night's sleep, and the well-appointed workspace allowed me to stay productive during my business trip.

The dining options at Conrad Pune are second to none. From the sumptuous breakfast buffet to the delectable dishes at the fine dining restaurant, every meal was a culinary delight. The variety and quality of the cuisine truly exceeded my expectations.

The hotel staff demonstrated exceptional professionalism and courtesy throughout my stay. They were always attentive to my needs and went above and beyond to ensure my stay was comfortable and enjoyable. The level of service provided by the team at Conrad Pune truly sets them apart.

The hotel's amenities, including the well-equipped fitness center and the serene spa, provided opportunities for relaxation and rejuvenation. The attention to detail in every aspect of the hotel's offerings is truly commendable.

Conrad Pune's central location made it convenient for both business and leisure activities in the city. The seamless check-in and check-out process further added to the overall positive experience.

In conclusion, my stay at Conrad Pune was nothing short of exceptional. The combination of luxurious accommodations, outstanding dining options, impeccable service, and convenient location make it a top choice for both business and leisure travelers. I highly recommend Conrad Pune for an unforgettable stay in the city.

text.text:
Title: A Culinary Haven with Unmatched Luxury: JW Marriott Hotel Pune

Review:

I recently had the pleasure of staying at the JW Marriott Hotel in Pune, and I must say it was an unforgettable experience from start to finish. From the moment I stepped into the hotel, I was captivated by its luxurious ambiance and warm hospitality. Every aspect, from the exquisite food to the impeccable service, contributed to making my stay truly exceptional.

Let's start with the food. The culinary offerings at JW Marriott Pune are simply outstanding. The hotel boasts a variety of dining options, each with its own unique charm. Whether you prefer authentic Indian cuisine, international delicacies, or indulgent desserts, this hotel has it all. The flavors, presentation, and quality of the food were consistently top-notch, and I found myself looking forward to every meal. The skilled chefs take great pride in their craft, and it's evident in every dish they create.

The hotel's restaurants offer a delightful ambiance that complements the culinary experience perfectly. The decor is elegant, with a blend of modern and traditional elements, creating a sophisticated yet comfortable atmosphere. Whether you're enjoying a romantic dinner at Shakahari, the hotel's vegetarian specialty restaurant, or having a casual lunch at Alto Vino, their Italian eatery, you'll be surrounded by an inviting setting that enhances the dining experience.

What truly sets JW Marriott Pune apart is its exceptional service. The staff members are genuinely attentive, friendly, and go above and beyond to ensure every guest feels welcomed and cared for. From the warm greetings at the entrance to the prompt and efficient service at the restaurants, the staff consistently exceeded my expectations. They were always ready to accommodate special requests and provide helpful recommendations, making me feel like a valued guest throughout my stay.

In addition to the outstanding food, atmosphere, and service, the hotel offers a range of amenities that further enhance the overall experience. The well-equipped fitness center, luxurious spa, and refreshing swimming pool provided opportunities to unwind and rejuvenate after a busy day. The attention to detail in every aspect of the hotel's design and facilities truly reflects the commitment to excellence that JW Marriott is known for.

Overall, my stay at JW Marriott Hotel Pune was nothing short of exceptional. The combination of delectable food, inviting ambiance, and exceptional service created an experience that exceeded all my expectations. I highly recommend this hotel to anyone seeking a luxurious and memorable stay in Pune. Whether you're a food enthusiast, a traveler seeking comfort and relaxation, or someone who appreciates the finer things in life, JW Marriott Pune will leave an indelible impression on you.

text.text:
Title: Disappointing Experience at JW Marriott Pune

I recently had the opportunity to stay at JW Marriott Pune, and unfortunately, it was one of the most disappointing experiences I have ever had in a hotel. As someone who has stayed in numerous luxury accommodations around the world and experienced the best of hospitality, I was shocked by the subpar level of service provided at this establishment.

Firstly, the quality of the food was far from satisfactory. The dal, vegetable curries, and other dishes were served cold, which was extremely disappointing. Additionally, the wait time for ordering was excessively long, making the dining experience frustrating and time-consuming.

Moreover, the lack of coordination among the staff was evident throughout my visit. For instance, when my family and I arrived for lunch, we were informed that the buffet would be available until 3:30 PM. However, to our dismay, it closed earlier than promised, preventing us from enjoying a meal. Despite this inconvenience, we were still charged for the full buffet, which seemed unfair and insensitive.

Another area of concern was the room service. Numerous attempts to reach them went unanswered, leaving us feeling ignored and neglected. The unprofessional behavior exhibited by the staff further exacerbated our frustration. Their indifference and lack of care gave the impression that they did not value their guests.

Given my experience, I would strongly advise against wasting your money on a hotel that fails to meet even the basic standards of hospitality. The JW Marriott Pune left a lot to be desired, and I regret choosing it for my stay. I sincerely hope that the management takes note of these issues and makes the necessary improvements to ensure a more pleasant experience for future guests.

text.text:
I recently stayed at Royal Orchid Central, Pune, and overall, it was a wonderful experience. The rooms were clean, comfortable, and well-maintained, and the service across the board was prompt and courteous. Housekeeping was efficient, and the amenities offered were up to the mark for a comfortable business or leisure stay.

However, I did face one hiccup at the front desk, which left me a bit disappointed. I had inquired about any ongoing offers or discounts at their in-house restaurant for hotel guests—something that’s fairly common at most hotels. Initially, I was told there was an offer, but when it came time for billing, they denied any such discount without clear explanation. It felt like the front desk staff either weren’t informed or weren’t aligned with the restaurant’s communication, which was frustrating.

originalText.text:
I recently stayed at Royal Orchid Central, Pune, and overall, it was a wonderful experience. The rooms were clean, comfortable, and well-maintained, and the service across the board was prompt and courteous. Housekeeping was efficient, and the amenities offered were up to the mark for a comfortable business or leisure stay.

However, I did face one hiccup at the front desk, which left me a bit disappointed. I had inquired about any ongoing offers or discounts at their in-house restaurant for hotel guests—something that’s fairly common at most hotels. Initially, I was told there was an offer, but when it came time for billing, they denied any such discount without clear explanation. It felt like the front desk staff either weren’t informed or weren’t aligned with the restaurant’s communication, which was frustrating.

That aside, everything else was smooth. I would recommend the property for its location, cleanliness, and service—but do double-check restaurant details in writing if you’re relying on in-house dining offers.

I highly recommend this hotel for anyone visiting Pune. The combination of excellent service, fantastic food, and warm hospitality makes it a standout choice.

text.text:
Indulge in Elegance: The Ultimate Stay at Crowne Plaza Pune

Tucked away in the heart of Pune, Crowne Plaza is a sanctuary of comfort and sophistication. My recent stay there was nothing short of spectacular, marked by the seamless blend of luxury, culinary excellence, and exceptional service. The spacious rooms welcomed me with breathtaking views of the city skyline, creating a tranquil retreat away from the hustle and bustle below. Every corner of the room was thoughtfully designed, from the plush bedding to the modern amenities, making it the perfect place to unwind after a long day.

The experience began with the incredibly efficient front office team, whose professionalism and warm approach made check-in a breeze. My dining journey kicked off at Mosaic, a multi-cuisine outlet that truly lives up to its reputation. From Asian delicacies to classic European dishes and Indian favorites, every meal was a delightful explosion of flavors. The skilled chefs clearly know their craft, presenting each dish with finesse and a touch of creativity that made dining at Mosaic feel like a global culinary tour.

Evviva Sky Lounge, perched high above the city, quickly became my favorite spot. The panoramic views combined with the latest music set the perfect backdrop for a relaxing evening. The bar staff were nothing short of magicians, crafting cocktails that were as visually stunning as they were delicious. The atmosphere was vibrant, yet intimate—a rare balance that made Evviva feel like a hidden gem in the sky.

The food and beverage service team consistently impressed me with their attentiveness and deep knowledge of the menu, elevating the dining experience at every turn. It was clear that service excellence is a core value at Crowne Plaza, and it shines through in every interaction.

I also had the opportunity to explore the hotel’s banqueting facilities, which were elegantly designed and equipped to handle everything from intimate gatherings to large celebrations. The level of detail put into each event space reflected the hotel’s commitment to quality, making it an ideal choice for any occasion.

For a bit of relaxation, the spa offered a much-needed escape. The therapists guided me through a rejuvenating experience that left me feeling refreshed and recharged. It’s an oasis within the hotel, providing a perfect balance of tranquility and luxury. The fitness room, adjacent to the spa, was well-equipped and provided the perfect setting for a quick workout, allowing me to keep up with my fitness routine effortlessly.

Navigating the hotel was made even smoother thanks to the quick and efficient valet and security staff, who were always on hand to assist with a level of service that was both courteous and professional.

Crowne Plaza Pune is more than just a hotel—it’s a complete experience that caters to every need with style and grace. From the enchanting views and luxurious rooms to the top-notch dining and impeccable service, every aspect of my stay was thoughtfully curated, making it a place I’ll eagerly return to whenever I’m in Pune.

Thanks to the entire team. From expert and experienced GM to normal Bus Boy working for Crowne, each and everyone is there to make your visit unforgettable.

Manav Kaushik

text.text:
The St Laurn Hotel in Pune is a well-regarded choice for a cozy stay, known for its comfortable accommodations and pleasant ambiance. Here’s an overview of what makes it a great option:

St Laurn Hotel Highlights:
Comfortable and Well-Appointed Rooms:

The rooms are designed to be cozy yet functional, providing a comfortable environment for guests. They are equipped with modern amenities such as high-speed internet, flat-screen TVs, and comfortable bedding.
Cleanliness and Hygiene:

The hotel maintains high standards of cleanliness, ensuring that the rooms and common areas are well-kept and hygienic.
Ambiance:

St Laurn Hotel offers a serene and relaxing ambiance, making it a perfect place for guests looking to unwind. The décor is elegant and contemporary, creating a welcoming atmosphere.
Dining Options:

The hotel features a variety of dining options, from a multi-cuisine restaurant to a café, offering a range of delicious dishes in a comfortable setting.
Location:

Conveniently located in Koregaon Park, one of Pune's most upscale neighborhoods, the hotel provides easy access to shopping, dining, and entertainment options. It's also close to major business districts, making it ideal for both leisure and business travelers.
Amenities:

St Laurn Hotel offers several amenities, including a fitness center, a swimming pool, and a spa, ensuring guests have everything they need for a comfortable stay.

text.text:
I left my city for the first time and moved to Pune a week ago. Destiny got me to Urban Nomads and I can call myself LUCKY officially now. No doubt. Check out these details.

Bed- 5 out of 5 (Comfortable)
Room- 5 out of 5 (Spacious)
Cleanliness- 5 out of 5 (Keep it as clean as your own place)
Food - 5 out 5 (Ask for anything, you will get it. I used to spend a hefty money on Zomato at my home but I am saving that here)

I am sure these are your only check points but wait.

People - It's 6 out of 5 (I will miss this place when I leave but I will miss these people more)
Diversity - It's 6 out of 5 (A German & a filipino living in my room don't wanna leave, can you just imagine?)
Accountability - Thanks Raghav. I always have a single point of contact.
Location - It's 6 out of 5 & I am from Delhi. So, you can understand 6 is a big deal.

I work from here and I see people enjoying from here. Few making connections & few for their personal work. What type of visit is yours? This stay will give you more than your expectations.

text.text:
The Sheraton Grand Pune is a luxurious hotel that combines modern amenities with timeless elegance. Located in the heart of the city, it is an ideal choice for both business and leisure travelers. My recent experience at this property was delightful, particularly in terms of its event spaces and culinary offerings.

The hotel’s banquet halls are spacious and beautifully designed, making them perfect for weddings, corporate events, or social gatherings. The architectural details, including high ceilings and intricate decor, add a touch of grandeur. The staff is highly professional and attentive, ensuring every aspect of the event runs smoothly. Whether it’s the lighting, seating arrangements, or technical support, they handle it all with precision and care.

The food at Sheraton Grand Pune is nothing short of exceptional. The diverse menu caters to a wide range of tastes, from traditional Indian delicacies to international cuisines. The live counters and desserts are particularly noteworthy, showcasing both creativity and high-quality ingredients. I was impressed by the presentation and flavor of every dish I tried. The chefs clearly have a passion for their craft, and it shows.

Overall, Sheraton Grand Pune offers an outstanding experience, combining luxury, excellent service, and delicious food. Whether you're hosting an event or simply looking for a sophisticated stay, this hotel is an excellent choice. I would highly recommend it to anyone seeking a premium hospitality experience in Pune.

text.text:
I recently had the pleasure of staying at Lemon Tree Hotel Vimannagar, and I must say it was a truly delightful experience. From the moment I walked through the doors, the hotel's warm and inviting atmosphere captivated me. The exceptional service and attention to detail exceeded my expectations in every way possible.

The staff at Lemon Tree Hotel Vimannagar truly went above and beyond to ensure my comfort and satisfaction throughout my stay. Their friendly and welcoming demeanor made me feel right at home. They were always ready to assist with any queries or requests, displaying an unmatched level of professionalism.

The room I stayed in was spacious, clean, and beautifully designed. It had all the amenities one could ask for, including a comfortable bed, a well-stocked minibar, and a modern bathroom. The attention to detail was evident in the meticulous cleanliness and thoughtfully arranged furnishings.

What impressed me the most was the hotel's commitment to providing an exceptional guest experience. They offered me a free late check-out option, allowing me to relax and enjoy my stay without feeling rushed. Furthermore, the complimentary drop-off service to the airport was an unexpected and generous gesture that made my departure hassle-free.

The dining options at Lemon Tree Hotel Vimannagar were fantastic. The breakfast buffet showcased a wide variety of delicious dishes, catering to different tastes and dietary preferences. The restaurant staff was attentive, ensuring that every guest was taken care of with a smile.

The hotel's location in Vimannagar was ideal for both business and leisure travelers. It provided easy access to the airport and was in close proximity to several popular attractions and shopping centers. Additionally, the surrounding neighborhood felt safe and vibrant, with numerous dining and entertainment options within walking distance.

Overall, my stay at Lemon Tree Hotel Vimannagar was nothing short of exceptional. The staff's dedication to providing impeccable service, the comfortable and well-appointed rooms, and the thoughtful amenities created a memorable experience for me. I highly recommend this hotel to anyone visiting the area and look forward to returning on my future trips.

I had a fantastic experience at Four Points by Sheraton for four main reasons:

1. Exceptional Staff: The staff went above and beyond to make my stay enjoyable. Their friendliness and attentiveness greatly enhanced the overall experience.

2.Outstanding Room Service: The room service providers delivered an excellent service. Their efficiency and dedication ensured that all my needs were met promptly and with a high level of quality.

4.Overall Satisfaction: From check-in to room service, Four Points by Sheraton exceeded my expectations. I would highly recommend it to others based on the exceptional staff, top-notch room service, and the memorable contributions of Ghanshyam and Faleshwari.

text.text: We are there in March/April, Pune’s weather - morning cool, afternoon hot, night cool but somehow dusty. The Hotel’s meals are great and authentic, recommend you to go the hotel’s outdoor dining area for your breakfast, it’s very cool with morning sun. The staffs are friendly and great hospitality. The room are neat and clean. The best part is mineral waters are provided free of charge EVERYDAY -> 2 in bathroom, 2 on table, 2 on each side of the bed, total 8 bottles per day. We bought extra 3 big mineral bottles from phoenix mall, apparently there is no need to buy since the hotel’s mineral waters are sufficient for each day usage. You can request to check out latest by 2pm, it is chargeable after that. I hope that the hotel continue to maintain the standard. Hope this help!
